website_summaries.verdict: Mirror that offers a modern look with a beveled edge and a floating frameless design.
pros: Sharp looking frameless mirror design that fits perfectly with modern decor
This large 30-inch by 40-inch rectangular mirror gives you a sharp reflective quality
You also can select round, oval, and square shapes in this style for added versatility
cons: Occasional problems with the mirror warping

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner !
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this mirror. It's over the fireplace and brightens the room and reflects the Golden Gate Bridge in my small apartment ! It was delivered on time, packed very securely , undamaged , with easy to follow instructions & the hardware included. I was able to install it with a friend who had an injuried arm as my consultant & moral support/ assistant. We are both in our sixties. The mirror was heavy but manageable . I am 5'3" / 120 lbs . learning to be a "Handyman" after a recent divorce of a 40 yr marriage. Need to work on my measuring skills & using tools more effectively . The mirror project was a success !
customer_reviews.author: patricia neaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design for any space
customer_reviews.text: We hung this horizontally in our remodeled, contemporary, master bath. It is simple, elegant, and most importantly, well-built. I looked EVERYWHERE for a mirror and this exceeded my expectations. IMHO the best value out there. On a side note, customer service was exceptional. Our first one arrived slightly cracked (rough shipping, I'm sure) and a new one was sent out immediately so as not to hold up our remodel. Any company that stands behind their product and offers affordable, quality, products is a company I will do business with again. Thanks HH!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cammarata

customer_reviews.title: Durable and clear
customer_reviews.text: It's a mirror and does mirrorly things but what makes it good is the lack of distortion, durability and ease of adding lights behind it.
customer_reviews.author: S.Pace

customer_reviews.title: Will Warp - Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Nov and hung according to the instructions. Only 5 months later it’s warped be almost an inch (see pics) and looks like a fun house mirror! It’s also unreturnable and a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two as an update to my one-piece full vanity master bath mirror. They shipped well protected. It was almost difficult to unwrap the package- a positive in my book. Two nail hooks were included and I was happy to see four wall cushions on the back of the mirror. Originally I thought the mirrors were going to be angled due to the mounting style, but nope. The mirror hangs perfectly flat! I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LizzieB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived packaged very well and in perfect condition. I hung it myself, just took my time with proper measurements and so not to chip the mirror. I taped the black protective plastic corners on that were used for shipping, to assure I wouldn't chip them, then removed once hung. My only concern is the mirror not pulling the nails downward from the drywall, then out of the wall with the weight of the mirror as I did not hit any studs. Yet with the reviews it said no special hardware necessary, but will tell with time..
customer_reviews.author: Chris949RN

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good when it arrived. I was satisfied. Gradually over 6 month period it turned into a fun house mirror, totally warped! Was placed in a 1/2 bath so moisture should not have been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Bender

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Hills Simple Square Mirrow
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I arrived securely packaged and in perfect condition. While hanging hardware was provided, I opted to hang using expanding plastic sleeves with screws into the drywall for extra security. Love the adhered stops to ensure the mirror hangs straight. I liked the simple, clean lines of the mirror mounted above my new bathroom basin sink. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious with supplied mirror hangers
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived on time and well packaged. The mirror is beautiful and indeed is from China. One precaution suggestion. When using the supplied hanger hardware I did not notice a small defect in one of them which resulted in the hanger failing and letting the mirror drop damaging one corner. Amazon was great and replaced it at no cost and sent a replacement in 3 days. However I used different hardware to hang both mirrors and they look terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Mirror warped
customer_reviews.text: The mirror warped and now has a very noticeable convexity. It is not usable. Unfortunately, it's past the point of being returnable.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin l.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. Both started bending after 2 months of hanging.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yavari

customer_reviews.title: Quality is overstated.
customer_reviews.text: I received the mirror A-OK without damage, but I think the mirror as portrayed on Amazon is a misrepresentation. Example: the solid core backing is about the same thickness as the glass itself, but the image on Amazon shows a backing that is 2-3 times the thickness of the mirror. That may seem a small item, but that was important to me based upon my bath remodel. It's also not wood, but appears to be medium/high density fiberboard. Also, one of the soft feet cushion pads was missing, implying quality control issues. I'm not sure I would return the item, but think I could have purchased elsewhere and saved money with no difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Attractive mirror!
customer_reviews.text: We installed 2 of these mirrors as part of a Master Bath remodel. They appear to be very high quality, are very attractive, and the wall hooks were easy to install. The mirrors have a padded back and gently rest on the bottom wall above our vanities. They arrived via UPS, were double boxed, with plenty of hard edge protectors and foam pieces. The seller sent an email indicating that if there was any damage to contact them via reply email which was a nice gesture. Fortunately they arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Laker2

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 mirrors for our master bath remodel. They arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. They are very well constructed with a wood backing, and clips to hang vertically or horizontally. They went up quickly and easily. They are beautiful! Thank you for a great product and service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product-go ahead and buy it.

Only I and my husband know.

Now, in the morning I look in the mirror and see myself and the scratch.

customer_reviews.title: ... a nightmare to put up was in fact very easy! The manufacturer

The mirror is less than 50 pounds, solid, and looks just great in my remodeled bathroom. Thank you for such a good product!!
